cards.name: Angelfire Crusader
cards.text: {R}: Angelfire Crusader gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Nothing burns hotter than the fires of holy rage.
cards.original_text: {R}: Angelfire Crusader gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Coalition Flag
cards.text:
Enchant creature you control
Enchanted creature is a Flagbearer.
While choosing targets as part of casting a spell or activating an ability, your opponents must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able.
cards.original_text:
Coalition Flag can enchant only a creature you control.
Enchanted creature's type is Flagbearer.
If an opponent plays a spell or ability that could target a Flagbearer in play, that player chooses at least one Flagbearer as a target.

rulings.text: If this card is ever on a creature you don't control, it is put into the graveyard as a State-Based Action.

cards.name: Coalition Honor Guard
cards.text: While choosing targets as part of casting a spell or activating an ability, your opponents must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able.
cards.flavor: Giving little thought to their own defense, they carried the flag that united their army.
cards.original_text: If an opponent plays a spell or ability that could target a Flagbearer in play, that player chooses at least one Flagbearer as a target.

rulings.text: Any player's Flagbearer may be targeted. For example, if each player controls a Coalition Honor Guard, Seal of Strength's ability may target any of them.

Activated abilities contain a colon. They're generally written "[Cost]: [Effect]." Some keywords are activated abilities and will have colons in their reminder text. Triggered abilities (written with "when," "whenever," or "at") don't have to target a Flagbearer.
If a spell or ability's targets are changed, or if a copy of a spell or ability is put onto the stack and has new targets chosen, it doesn't have to target a Flagbearer.

cards.name: Dega Disciple
cards.text:
{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
{R}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "There is no true equity of power. There is only more and less."
cards.original_text:
{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
{R}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Dega Sanctuary
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a black or red permanent, you gain 2 life. If you control a black permanent and a red permanent, you gain 4 life instead.
cards.original_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a black or red permanent, you gain 2 life. If you control a black permanent and a red permanent, you gain 4 life instead.

rulings.text: You can gain 2 or 4 life, but never 6.

cards.name: Degavolver
cards.text:
Kicker {1}{B} and/or {R} (You may pay an additional {1}{B} and/or {R} as you cast this spell.)
If Degavolver was kicked with its {1}{B} kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with "Pay 3 life: Regenerate Degavolver."
If Degavolver was kicked with its {R} kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with first strike.

cards.name: Diversionary Tactics
cards.text: Tap two untapped creatures you control: Tap target creature.
cards.flavor: "It's the oldest trick in the book," said Guff. "And I ought to know—I wrote it."
cards.original_text: Tap two untapped creatures you control: Tap target creature.

cards.name: Divine Light
cards.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn to creatures you control.
cards.flavor:
"Phyrexia is an unforgiving place, and I am an angry lord in an unforgiving mood."
—Lord Windgrace
cards.original_text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn to creatures you control.

cards.name: Enlistment Officer
cards.text:
First strike
When Enlistment Officer enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Soldier cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
cards.original_text:
First strike
When Enlistment Officer comes into play, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Soldier cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library.

cards.name: False Dawn
cards.text:
Until end of turn, spells and abilities you control that would add colored mana instead add that much white mana. Until end of turn, you may spend white mana as though it were mana of any color.
Draw a card.
cards.original_text:
Colored mana symbols on all permanents you control and on all cards you own that aren't in play become {W} until end of turn.
Draw a card.

rulings.text: This card's ability does not change the color of any permanents.
This card's ability does not change any lands into Plains.

cards.name: Gerrard Capashen
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life for each card in target opponent's hand.
{3}{W}: Tap target creature. Activate this ability only if Gerrard Capashen is attacking.
cards.original_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you gain 1 life for each card in target opponent's hand.
{3}{W}: Tap target creature. Play this ability only if Gerrard Capashen is attacking.

cards.name: Haunted Angel
cards.text:
Flying
When Haunted Angel dies, exile Haunted Angel and each other player creates a 3/3 black Angel creature token with flying.
cards.original_text:
Flying
When Haunted Angel is put into a graveyard from play, remove Haunted Angel from the game and each other player puts a 3/3 black Angel creature token with flying into play.

cards.name: Helionaut
cards.text:
Flying
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
cards.flavor: Hope kept the defenders aloft, but only courage kept them in the fight.
cards.original_text:
Flying
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

cards.name: Manacles of Decay
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack.
{B}: Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
{R}: Enchanted creature can't block this turn.
cards.original_text:
Enchanted creature can't attack.
{B}: Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
{R}: Enchanted creature can't block this turn.

cards.name: Orim's Thunder
cards.text:
Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.)
Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If this spell was kicked, it deals damage equal to that permanent's converted mana cost to target creature.
cards.original_text:
Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you play this spell.)
Destroy target artifact or enchantment. If you paid the kicker cost, Orim's Thunder deals damage equal to that artifact or enchantment's converted mana cost to target creature.

cards.name: Shield of Duty and Reason
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has protection from green and from blue.
cards.flavor: The duty: to defend. The reason: to survive.
cards.original_text: Enchanted creature has protection from green and from blue.

foreign_names.name: Bouclier du devoir et de la raison
Scudo del Dovere e della Ragione

cards.name: Spectral Lynx
cards.text:
Protection from green
{B}: Regenerate Spectral Lynx.
cards.flavor: A shadowy version of its corporeal cousin, this lynx hunts souls, not meals.
cards.original_text:
Protection from green
{B}: Regenerate Spectral Lynx.

cards.name: Standard Bearer
cards.text: While choosing targets as part of casting a spell or activating an ability, your opponents must choose at least one Flagbearer on the battlefield if able.
cards.flavor: The standard was a rallying point for the army and a target for the enemy.
cards.original_text: If an opponent plays a spell or ability that could target a Flagbearer in play, that player chooses at least one Flagbearer as a target.

cards.name: Ceta Disciple
cards.text:
{R}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
{G}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
cards.flavor: "The sea holds all that you need. You simply must know how to ask for it."
cards.original_text:
{R}, {T}: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
{G}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

cards.name: Ceta Sanctuary
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a red or green permanent, draw a card, then discard a card. If you control a red permanent and a green permanent, instead draw two cards, then discard a card.
cards.original_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a red or green permanent, draw a card, then discard a card from your hand. If you control a red permanent and a green permanent, instead draw two cards, then discard a card from your hand.

rulings.text: The ability has you draw one or two cards, but never three.

cards.name: Cetavolver
cards.text:
Kicker {1}{R} and/or {G} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} and/or {G} as you cast this spell.)
If Cetavolver was kicked with its {1}{R} kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with first strike.
If Cetavolver was kicked with its {G} kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with trample.

cards.name: Coastal Drake
cards.text:
Flying
{1}{U}, {T}: Return target Kavu to its owner's hand.
cards.flavor: When the kavu emerged from their ancient nests, food chains long dormant became vibrant again.
cards.original_text:
Flying
{1}{U}, {T}: Return target Kavu to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Evasive Action
cards.text: Domain — Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each basic land type among lands you control.
cards.flavor: Effective use of terrain is a lesson good commanders learn quickly.
cards.original_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each basic land type among lands you control.

rulings.text: To determine the number of basic land types among lands you control, look at the lands you have on the battlefield and ask yourself whether the subtypes Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest appear within that group. The number of times you say yes (topping out at five) tells you how powerful your domain abilities will be.

How many lands you control of a particular basic land type is irrelevant to a domain ability, as long as that number is greater than zero. As far as domain is concerned, ten Forests is the same as one Forest.

A number of nonbasic lands have basic land types. Domain abilities don't count the number of lands you control — they count the number of basic land types among lands you control, even if that means checking the same land twice. For example, if you control a Tundra, an Overgrown Tomb, and a Madblind Mountain, you'll have a Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest among the lands you control. Your domain abilities will be maxed out.

cards.name: Ice Cave
cards.text: Whenever a player casts a spell, any other player may pay that spell's mana cost. If a player does, counter the spell. (Mana cost includes color.)
cards.flavor: Even the oppresive cold of the cave could not temper Eladamri's ire.
cards.original_text: Whenever a player plays a spell, any other player may pay that spell's mana cost. If a player does, counter the spell. (Mana cost includes color.)

rulings.text: The mana cost does not include cost increases or reductions.

cards.name: Index
cards.text: Look at the top five cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
cards.flavor: "Let's see . . . Mercadia, mercenary, merfolk . . . you know, I really need a better filing system."
cards.original_text: Look at the top five cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

cards.name: Jaded Response
cards.text: Counter target spell if it shares a color with a creature you control.
cards.flavor:
"Calm down everyone; it's nothing we haven't seen before."
—Sisay
cards.original_text: Counter target spell if it shares a color with a creature you control.

rulings.text: It does not check colors until it resolves.

cards.name: Jilt
cards.text:
Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you cast this spell.)
Return target creature to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, it deals 2 damage to another target creature.
cards.flavor:
"You're not my Hanna"
—Gerrard, to Yawgmoth
cards.original_text:
Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you play this spell.)
Return target creature to its owner's hand. If you paid the kicker cost, Jilt deals 2 damage to another target creature.

cards.name: Living Airship
cards.text:
Flying
{2}{G}: Regenerate Living Airship.
cards.flavor: The ship has a crew of three: the pilot, the gunner, and the ship itself.
cards.original_text:
Flying
{2}{G}: Regenerate Living Airship.

cards.name: Reef Shaman
cards.text: {T}: Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
cards.flavor: With one gesture, she can render a thousand years of navigational charts obsolete.
cards.original_text: {T}: Target land's type becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.

cards.name: Shimmering Mirage
cards.text:
Target land becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"Oh, is that all you need? Why didn't you just say so?"
—Reef shaman
cards.original_text:
Target land's type becomes the basic land type of your choice until end of turn.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Tidal Courier
cards.text:
When Tidal Courier enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Merfolk cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
{3}{U}: Tidal Courier gains flying until end of turn.
cards.original_text:
When Tidal Courier comes into play, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Merfolk cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library.
{3}{U}: Tidal Courier gains flying until end of turn.

cards.name: Unnatural Selection
cards.text: {1}: Choose a creature type other than Wall. Target creature becomes that type until end of turn.
cards.flavor: What nature makes, magic can modify.
cards.original_text: {1}: Choose a creature type other than Wall. Target creature's type becomes that type until end of turn.

rulings.text: You must choose a creature type that already exists in Magic.

cards.name: Vodalian Mystic
cards.text: {T}: Target instant or sorcery spell becomes the color of your choice.
cards.flavor:
"Sometimes when I look at the ocean, I could swear it changes colors."
—Sisay
cards.original_text: {T}: Target instant or sorcery spell becomes the color of your choice.

rulings.text: It can target spells of type instant or sorcery, and not spells of other types that say they can be cast "any time you could cast" an instant or sorcery.

cards.name: Whirlpool Drake
cards.text:
Flying
When Whirlpool Drake enters the battlefield, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.
When Whirlpool Drake dies, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.
cards.original_text:
Flying
When Whirlpool Drake comes into play, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.
When Whirlpool Drake is put into a graveyard from play, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.

cards.name: Whirlpool Rider
cards.text: When Whirlpool Rider enters the battlefield, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.
cards.flavor: Where the wind meets the water, change is inevitable.
cards.original_text: When Whirlpool Rider comes into play, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.

cards.name: Whirlpool Warrior
cards.text:
When Whirlpool Warrior enters the battlefield, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.
{R}, Sacrifice Whirlpool Warrior: Each player shuffles the cards from their hand into their library, then draws that many cards.
cards.original_text:
When Whirlpool Warrior comes into play, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.
{R}, Sacrifice Whirlpool Warrior: Each player shuffles the cards from his or her hand into his or her library, then draws that many cards.

cards.name: Dead Ringers
cards.text: Destroy two target nonblack creatures unless either one is a color the other isn't. They can't be regenerated.
cards.flavor: "Beautiful, isn't it?" crowed Crovax. "They fought together. Now they will die together."
cards.original_text: Destroy two target nonblack creatures unless either one is a color the other isn't. They can't be regenerated.

rulings.text: Both of the target creatures must be exactly the same color or combination of colors. Both being colorless is also okay. If they differ in any way, you can still cast the spell, but it does not do anything on resolution.
Colors are checked on resolution.

cards.name: Desolation Angel
cards.text:
Kicker {W}{W} (You may pay an additional {W}{W} as you cast this spell.)
Flying
When Desolation Angel enters the battlefield, destroy all lands you control. If it was kicked, destroy all lands instead.
cards.original_text:
Kicker {W}{W} (You may pay an additional {W}{W} as you play this spell.)
Flying
When Desolation Angel comes into play, destroy all lands you control. If you paid the kicker cost, destroy all lands instead.

cards.name: Foul Presence
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and has "{T}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn."
cards.flavor: The Phyrexians have one word that means both "evolution" and "pain."
cards.original_text: Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and has "{T}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn."

cards.name: Grave Defiler
cards.text:
When Grave Defiler enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Zombie cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
{1}{B}: Regenerate Grave Defiler.
cards.original_text:
When Grave Defiler comes into play, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Zombie cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library.
{1}{B}: Regenerate Grave Defiler.

cards.name: Last Caress
cards.text:
Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Draw a card.
cards.original_text:
Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Mind Extraction
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Target player reveals their hand and discards all cards of each of the sacrificed creature's colors.
cards.original_text:
As an additional cost to play Mind Extraction, sacrifice a creature.
Target player reveals his or her hand and discards all cards of each of the sacrificed creature's colors from it.

rulings.text: If you sacrifice a colorless creature, you get to see their hand but they discard no cards.
If you sacrifice a multicolored creature, all cards that share at least one color with the creature are discarded.
You must sacrifice exactly one creature to cast this spell; you cannot cast it without sacrificing a creature, and you cannot sacrifice additional creatures.
Players can only respond once this spell has been cast and all its costs have been paid. No one can try to destroy the creature you sacrificed to prevent you from casting this spell.

cards.name: Mournful Zombie
cards.text: {W}, {T}: Target player gains 1 life.
cards.flavor: Treated with a powerful mix of herbs and potions, its wrappings have a remarkable preservative effect, even for the living.
cards.original_text: {W}, {T}: Target player gains 1 life.

cards.name: Necra Disciple
cards.text:
{G}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
{W}, {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
cards.flavor: "The darkness merely hides the light."
cards.original_text:
{G}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
{W}, {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

cards.name: Necra Sanctuary
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a green or white permanent, target player loses 1 life. If you control a green permanent and a white permanent, that player loses 3 life instead.
cards.original_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a green or white permanent, target player loses 1 life. If you control a green permanent and a white permanent, that player loses 3 life instead.

rulings.text: It can make a player lose 0, 1, or 3 life, but never 4.
One permanent that is both white and green will cause the player to be affected by the lose 3 life portion.

cards.name: Necravolver
cards.text:
Kicker {1}{G} and/or {W} (You may pay an additional {1}{G} and/or {W} as you cast this spell.)
If Necravolver was kicked with its {1}{G} kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with trample.
If Necravolver was kicked with its {W} kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with "Whenever Necravolver deals damage, you gain that much life."

cards.name: Phyrexian Arena
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
cards.flavor: An audience of one with the malice of thousands.
cards.original_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

cards.name: Phyrexian Gargantua
cards.text: When Phyrexian Gargantua enters the battlefield, you draw two cards and you lose 2 life.
cards.flavor: Other Phyrexians have nightmares about the gargantua.
cards.original_text: When Phyrexian Gargantua comes into play, you draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

cards.name: Phyrexian Rager
cards.text: When Phyrexian Rager enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
cards.flavor: It takes no prisoners, but it keeps the choicest bits for Phyrexia.
cards.original_text: When Phyrexian Rager comes into play, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

cards.name: Planar Despair
cards.text: Domain — All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.
cards.flavor: All of Dominaria recoiled as Yawgmoth and his retainers arrived.
cards.original_text: All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn for each basic land type among lands you control.

rulings.text: To determine the number of basic land types among lands you control, look at the lands you have on the battlefield and ask yourself whether the subtypes Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest appear within that group. The number of times you say yes (topping out at five) tells you how powerful your domain abilities will be.

How many lands you control of a particular basic land type is irrelevant to a domain ability, as long as that number is greater than zero. As far as domain is concerned, ten Forests is the same as one Forest.

A number of nonbasic lands have basic land types. Domain abilities don't count the number of lands you control — they count the number of basic land types among lands you control, even if that means checking the same land twice. For example, if you control a Tundra, an Overgrown Tomb, and a Madblind Mountain, you'll have a Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest among the lands you control. Your domain abilities will be maxed out.

cards.name: Quagmire Druid
cards.text: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target enchantment.
cards.flavor: As the druids had devoted their lives to preserving Dominaria, so did they devote their deaths.
cards.original_text: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target enchantment.

cards.name: Suppress
cards.text: Target player exiles all cards from their hand face down. At the beginning of the end step of that player's next turn, that player returns those cards to their hand.
cards.original_text: Target player removes all cards in his or her hand from the game face down. At the end of that player's next turn, that player returns those cards to his or her hand.

cards.name: Urborg Uprising
cards.text:
Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: In Urborg, few things are less permanent than death.
cards.original_text:
Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
Draw a card.

rulings.text: You can cast Urborg Uprising with zero targets if you only want to draw a card.
If you chose at least one target and all targets are illegal on resolution, you won't draw a card.

cards.name: Zombie Boa
cards.text: {1}{B}: Choose a color. Whenever Zombie Boa becomes blocked by a creature of that color this turn, destroy that creature. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
cards.flavor: It doesn't need to feed, but still it hungers.
cards.original_text: {1}{B}: Choose a color. Whenever Zombie Boa becomes blocked by a creature of that color this turn, destroy that creature. Play this ability only any time you could play a sorcery.

cards.original_text: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Colossus: Bloodfire Colossus deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

cards.name: Bloodfire Dwarf
cards.text: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Dwarf: Bloodfire Dwarf deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

cards.original_text: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Dwarf: Bloodfire Dwarf deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

Enchant creature you control

cards.original_text:

{R}, Sacrifice enchanted creature: Bloodfire Infusion deals damage equal to the enchanted creature's power to each creature.

rulings.text: If this card is ever on a creature you don't control, it is put into the graveyard as a State-Based Action.

cards.name: Bloodfire Kavu
cards.text: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Kavu: Bloodfire Kavu deals 2 damage to each creature.
cards.flavor: Heart of fire, blood of lava, teeth of stone.
cards.original_text: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Kavu: Bloodfire Kavu deals 2 damage to each creature.

cards.name: Desolation Giant
cards.text:
Kicker {W}{W} (You may pay an additional {W}{W} as you cast this spell.)
When Desolation Giant enters the battlefield, destroy all other creatures you control. If it was kicked, destroy all other creatures instead.
cards.original_text:

cards.name: Dwarven Patrol
cards.text:
Dwarven Patrol doesn't untap during your untap step.
Whenever you cast a nonred spell, untap Dwarven Patrol.
cards.flavor: Dwarves never worry about who watches their backs.
cards.original_text:
Dwarven Patrol doesn't untap during your untap step.
Whenever you play a nonred spell, untap Dwarven Patrol.

rulings.text: Remember that lands are not spells.

cards.name: Goblin Ringleader

Illuminate deals X damage to target creature. If you paid the {2}{R} kicker cost, Illuminate deals X damage to that creature's controller. If you paid the {3}{U} kicker cost, you draw X cards.

{U}: Kavu Glider gains flying until end of turn.
cards.original_text:
{W}: Kavu Glider gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
{U}: Kavu Glider gains flying until end of turn.

cards.name: Minotaur Tactician
cards.text:
Haste
Minotaur Tactician gets +1/+1 as long as you control a white creature.
Minotaur Tactician gets +1/+1 as long as you control a blue creature.
cards.original_text:
Haste (This creature may attack and {T} the turn it comes under your control.)
Minotaur Tactician gets +1/+1 as long as you control a white creature.
Minotaur Tactician gets +1/+1 as long as you control a blue creature.

cards.name: Raka Disciple
cards.text:
{W}, {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
{U}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "The strong can also be subtle."
cards.original_text:
{W}, {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
{U}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

cards.name: Raka Sanctuary
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a white or blue permanent, Raka Sanctuary deals 1 damage to target creature. If you control a white permanent and a blue permanent, Raka Sanctuary deals 3 damage to that creature instead.
cards.original_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a white or blue permanent, Raka Sanctuary deals 1 damage to target creature. If you control a white permanent and a blue permanent, Raka Sanctuary deals 3 damage to that creature instead.

rulings.text: It can deal 1 or 3 damage, but never 4.

cards.name: Rakavolver
cards.text:
Kicker {1}{W} and/or {U} (You may pay an additional {1}{W} and/or {U} as you cast this spell.)
If Rakavolver was kicked with its {1}{W} kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with "Whenever Rakavolver deals damage, you gain that much life."
If Rakavolver was kicked with its {U} kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with flying.

cards.name: Smash
cards.text:
Destroy target artifact.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"They're ugly, and they're in my way."
—Tahngarth
cards.original_text:
Destroy target artifact.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Tahngarth's Glare
cards.text: Look at the top three cards of target opponent's library, then put them back in any order. That player looks at the top three cards of your library, then puts them back in any order.
cards.original_text: Look at the top three cards of target opponent's library, then put them back in any order. That player looks at the top three cards of your library, then puts them back in any order.

cards.name: Tundra Kavu
cards.text: {T}: Target land becomes a Plains or an Island until end of turn.
cards.flavor: A cross between a jaguar and an armadillo.
cards.original_text: {T}: Target land becomes a plains or an island until end of turn.

cards.name: Wild Research
cards.text:
{1}{W}: Search your library for an enchantment card and reveal that card. Put it into your hand, then discard a card at random. Then shuffle your library.
{1}{U}: Search your library for an instant card and reveal that card. Put it into your hand, then discard a card at random. Then shuffle your library.
cards.original_text:
{1}{W}: Search your library for an enchantment card and reveal that card. Put it into your hand, then discard a card at random from your hand. Then shuffle your library.
{1}{U}: Search your library for an instant card and reveal that card. Put it into your hand, then discard a card at random from your hand. Then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: You do not have to find an enchantment or instant card if you do not want to.

cards.name: Ana Disciple
cards.text:
{U}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: "The blessings of Gaea alone are no longer enough."
cards.original_text:
{U}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
{B}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Ana Sanctuary
cards.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a blue or black permanent, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If you control a blue permanent and a black permanent, that creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn instead.
cards.original_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a blue or black permanent, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If you control a blue permanent and a black permanent, that creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn instead.

rulings.text: The creature either gets +1/+1 or +5/+5, never +6/+6.

cards.name: Anavolver
cards.text:
Kicker {1}{U} and/or {B} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} and/or {B} as you cast this spell.)
If Anavolver was kicked with its {1}{U} kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with flying.
If Anavolver was kicked with its {B} kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with "Pay 3 life: Regenerate Anavolver."

cards.name: Bog Gnarr
cards.text: Whenever a player casts a black spell, Bog Gnarr gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Not all of Dominaria's defenders were nourished by the light.
cards.original_text: Whenever a player plays a black spell, Bog Gnarr gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.name: Gaea's Balance
cards.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice five lands.
Search your library for a land card of each basic land type and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
cards.original_text:
As an additional cost to play Gaea's Balance, sacrifice five lands.
Search your library for a land card of each basic land type and put them into play. Then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: You can find a nonbasic land card this way as long as it has a basic land type, such as Stomping Ground.
You can fail to find a land card for any or all basic land types, even if a land card with that basic land type is in your library.

cards.name: Glade Gnarr
cards.text: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, Glade Gnarr gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Long thought merely a legend, the appearance of the gnarr was seen by the defenders as a sign of good luck.
cards.original_text: Whenever a player plays a blue spell, Glade Gnarr gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.name: Kavu Howler
cards.text: When Kavu Howler enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Kavu cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
cards.original_text: When Kavu Howler comes into play, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Kavu cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library.

cards.name: Kavu Mauler
cards.text:
Trample
Whenever Kavu Mauler attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other attacking Kavu.
cards.flavor: To the kavu, all Phyrexians are merely crunchy snacks.
cards.original_text:
Trample
Whenever Kavu Mauler attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other attacking Kavu.

cards.name: Lay of the Land
cards.text: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
cards.flavor: Victory favors neither the righteous nor the wicked. It favors the prepared.
cards.original_text: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal that card, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: Because the "search" requires you to find a card with certain characteristics, you don't have to find the card if you don't want to.

cards.name: Penumbra Bobcat
cards.text: When Penumbra Bobcat dies, create a 2/1 black Cat creature token.
cards.flavor: This cat has two lives and it's hunting for more.
cards.original_text: When Penumbra Bobcat is put into a graveyard from play, put a 2/1 black Cat creature token into play.

cards.name: Penumbra Kavu
cards.text: When Penumbra Kavu dies, create a 3/3 black Kavu creature token.
cards.flavor:
"These kavu are so stubborn they even refuse to die."
—Tahngarth
cards.original_text: When Penumbra Kavu is put into a graveyard from play, put a 3/3 black Kavu creature token into play.

cards.name: Penumbra Wurm
cards.text:
Trample
When Penumbra Wurm dies, create a 6/6 black Wurm creature token with trample.
cards.original_text:
Trample
When Penumbra Wurm is put into a graveyard from play, put a 6/6 black Wurm creature token with trample into play.

cards.name: Savage Gorilla
cards.text: {U}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Savage Gorilla: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. Draw a card.
cards.flavor: These omnivorous gorillas have no qualms about a diet composed of equal parts fruit and Phyrexians.
cards.original_text: {U}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Savage Gorilla: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. Draw a card.

rulings.text: You do not get to draw a card if the target is not legal on resolution.

cards.name: Strength of Night
cards.text:
Kicker {B} (You may pay an additional {B} as you cast this spell.)
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, Zombie creatures you control get an additional +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.original_text:
Kicker {B} (You may pay an additional {B} as you play this spell.)
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If you paid the kicker cost, Zombies you control get an additional +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.name: Sylvan Messenger
cards.text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
When Sylvan Messenger enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Elf cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
cards.original_text:
Trample
When Sylvan Messenger comes into play, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Elf cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library.

cards.name: Symbiotic Deployment
cards.text:
Skip your draw step.
{1}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Draw a card.
cards.flavor:
"You know your orders. I know your hearts. Now the stronghold will know defeat."
—Eladamri
cards.original_text:
Skip your draw step.
{1}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Draw a card.

cards.name: Tranquil Path
cards.text:
Destroy all enchantments.
Draw a card.
cards.flavor: Freyalise bought the planeswalkers the time they needed by clearing a path through the misshapen hell of Phyrexia.
cards.original_text:
Destroy all enchantments.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Urborg Elf
cards.text: {T}: Add {B}, {G}, or {U}.
cards.flavor: The elves of Urborg are as deadly and capricious as the swamp itself.
cards.original_text: {T}: Add {G}, {U}, or {B} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Aether Mutation
cards.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens, where X is that creature's converted mana cost.
cards.original_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Put X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens into play, where X is its converted mana cost.

rulings.text: You only put the tokens onto the battlefield if the target creature is still a legal target on resolution.

cards.name: Captain's Maneuver
cards.text: The next X damage that would be dealt to target creature, planeswalker, or player this turn is dealt to another target creature, planeswalker, or player instead.
cards.flavor: Sisay discovered that the mirrored hull of the Weatherlight could be used as a defensive weapon.
cards.original_text: The next X damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn is dealt to another target creature or player instead.

rulings.text: If the second target is no longer on the battlefield, or if the second target is no longer a creature, player, or planeswalker when the damage would be redirected, the damage is dealt to the first target as if this spell was not cast.
If the first target is no longer on the battlefield, then the damage will not be dealt at all, so it can't be redirected by this ability.

cards.name: Consume Strength
cards.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: As Multani's troops invaded Urborg, the decay of the swamp became a feast for the living.
cards.original_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Another target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

cards.name: Cromat
cards.text:
{W}{B}: Destroy target creature blocking or blocked by Cromat.
{U}{R}: Cromat gains flying until end of turn.
{B}{G}: Regenerate Cromat.
{R}{W}: Cromat gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
{G}{U}: Put Cromat on top of its owner's library.
cards.original_text:
{W}{B}: Destroy target creature blocking or blocked by Cromat.
{U}{R}: Cromat gains flying until end of turn.
{B}{G}: Regenerate Cromat.
{R}{W}: Cromat gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
{G}{U}: Put Cromat on top of its owner's library.

cards.name: Death Grasp
cards.text: Death Grasp deals X damage to any target. You gain X life.
cards.flavor: Yawgmoth's greatest joy came from watching one hero defeat another.
cards.original_text: Death Grasp deals X damage to target creature or player. You gain X life.

cards.name: Death Mutation
cards.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. Create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens, where X is that creature's converted mana cost.
cards.original_text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated. Put X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens into play, where X is its converted mana cost.

rulings.text: If the target is illegal on resolution, the entire spell doesn't resolve. As such, you will not put any tokens onto the battlefield.

cards.name: Ebony Treefolk
cards.text: {B}{G}: Ebony Treefolk gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Its roots are equally happy to drink the water of a clear stream or the oily blood of a Phyrexian warrior.
cards.original_text: {B}{G}: Ebony Treefolk gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Fervent Charge
cards.text: Whenever a creature you control attacks, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: Crovax was nearly buried beneath the weight of his opponents.
cards.original_text: Whenever a creature you control attacks, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

cards.name: Flowstone Charger
cards.text: Whenever Flowstone Charger attacks, it gets +3/-3 until end of turn.
cards.flavor: A mane of flowstone and a mien of fury.
cards.original_text: Whenever Flowstone Charger attacks, it gets +3/-3 until end of turn.

cards.name: Fungal Shambler
cards.text:
Trample
Whenever Fungal Shambler deals damage to an opponent, you draw a card and that opponent discards a card.
cards.original_text:
Trample
Whenever Fungal Shambler deals damage to an opponent, you draw a card and that opponent discards a card from his or her hand.

cards.name: Gaea's Skyfolk
cards.text: Flying
cards.flavor: The grace of the forest and the spirit of the sea.
cards.original_text: Flying

cards.name: Gerrard's Verdict
cards.text: Target player discards two cards. You gain 3 life for each land card discarded this way.
cards.flavor: A heart of light and a soul of darkness cannot coexist.
cards.original_text: Target player discards two cards from his or her hand. You gain 3 life for each land card discarded this way.

cards.name: Goblin Legionnaire
cards.text:
{R}, Sacrifice Goblin Legionnaire: It deals 2 damage to any target.
{W}, Sacrifice Goblin Legionnaire: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
cards.original_text:
{R}, Sacrifice Goblin Legionnaire: Goblin Legionnaire deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
{W}, Sacrifice Goblin Legionnaire: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

cards.name: Goblin Trenches
cards.text: {2}, Sacrifice a land: Create two 1/1 red and white Goblin Soldier creature tokens.
cards.flavor: The ground rose and formed into thousands of tiny warriors. This fight was far from over.
cards.original_text: {2}, Sacrifice a land: Put two 1/1 red and white Goblin Soldier creature tokens into play.

rulings.text: The tokens are named "Goblin Soldier" and have the creature types "Goblin" and "Soldier".

cards.name: Guided Passage
cards.text: Reveal the cards in your library. An opponent chooses from among them a creature card, a land card, and a noncreature, nonland card. You put the chosen cards into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
cards.original_text: Reveal the cards in your library. An opponent chooses from among them a creature card, a land card, and a noncreature, nonland card. You put the chosen cards into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: If you have no cards of any of the specified card types, then ignore those types and the opponent only selects cards of the types you do have.
Yes, your opponents get to look at all the cards in your library.

cards.name: Jungle Barrier
cards.text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
When Jungle Barrier enters the battlefield, draw a card.
cards.flavor: A massive pull of mana caused all of Dominaria to pause—Multani had transplanted Yavimaya to Urborg's edge.
cards.original_text:
(Walls can't attack.)
When Jungle Barrier comes into play, draw a card.

cards.name: Last Stand
cards.text: Target opponent loses 2 life for each Swamp you control. Last Stand deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control. Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token for each Forest you control. You gain 2 life for each Plains you control. Draw a card for each Island you control, then discard that many cards.
cards.original_text: Target opponent loses 2 life for each swamp you control. Last Stand deals damage equal to the number of mountains you control to target creature. Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token into play for each forest you control. You gain 2 life for each plains you control. Draw a card for each island you control, then discard that many cards from your hand.

cards.name: Lightning Angel
cards.text: Flying, vigilance, haste
cards.original_text:
Flying; haste (This creature may attack and {T} the turn it comes under your control.)
Attacking doesn't cause Lightning Angel to tap.

cards.name: Llanowar Dead
cards.text: {T}: Add {B}.
cards.flavor: Just as leaves fall from the branches of a living tree, so too do the dead leave the elfhame.
cards.original_text: {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Martyrs' Tomb
cards.text: Pay 2 life: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
cards.flavor:
Honor the brave who fought,
Honor the dead who fell,
Honor the world they saved.
—Memorial inscription
cards.original_text: Pay 2 life: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

cards.name: Minotaur Illusionist
cards.text:
{1}{U}: Minotaur Illusionist gains shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
{R}, Sacrifice Minotaur Illusionist: It deals damage equal to its power to target creature.
cards.original_text:
{1}{U}: Minotaur Illusionist can't be the target of spells or abilities this turn.
{R}, Sacrifice Minotaur Illusionist: Minotaur Illusionist deals damage equal to its power to target creature.

cards.name: Mystic Snake
cards.text:
Flash
When Mystic Snake enters the battlefield, counter target spell.
cards.flavor: Its fangs are in your flesh before its hiss leaves your ears.
cards.original_text:
You may play Mystic Snake any time you could play an instant.
When Mystic Snake comes into play, counter target spell.

cards.name: Overgrown Estate
cards.text: Sacrifice a land: You gain 3 life.
cards.flavor: The decay of Crovax's ancestral home matched the state of his soul.
cards.original_text: Sacrifice a land: You gain 3 life.

cards.name: Pernicious Deed
cards.text: {X}, Sacrifice Pernicious Deed: Destroy each artifact, creature, and enchantment with converted mana cost X or less.
cards.flavor: "Yawgmoth," Freyalise whispered as she set the bomb, "now you will pay for your treachery."
cards.original_text: {X}, Sacrifice Pernicious Deed: Destroy each artifact, creature, and enchantment with converted mana cost X or less.

rulings.text: If a permanent has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be 0.
A token has a converted mana cost of 0 unless it is copying something else.

cards.name: Powerstone Minefield
cards.text: Whenever a creature attacks or blocks, Powerstone Minefield deals 2 damage to it.
cards.flavor:
"We have fought this far and lost too much. We will not turn back."
—Grizzlegom
cards.original_text: Whenever a creature attacks or blocks, Powerstone Minefield deals 2 damage to it.

cards.name: Prophetic Bolt
cards.text: Prophetic Bolt deals 4 damage to any target. Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
cards.original_text: Prophetic Bolt deals 4 damage to target creature or player. Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library.

cards.name: Putrid Warrior
cards.text:
Whenever Putrid Warrior deals damage, choose one —
• Each player loses 1 life.
• Each player gains 1 life.
cards.flavor: "I do not like it," said Grizzlegom, "but I will take every soldier I can get."
cards.original_text: Whenever Putrid Warrior deals damage, choose one each player loses 1 life; or each player gains 1 life.

cards.name: Quicksilver Dagger
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker. You draw a card."
cards.flavor: The dwarves call their quicksilver techniques "improvisational weaponsmithing."
cards.original_text: Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target player. You draw a card."

rulings.text: The enchanted creature is the source of both the damage ability and the resultant damage, not Quicksilver Dagger. For example, if Quicksilver Dagger and Curiosity enchant the same creature, Curiosity's ability will trigger when the damage is dealt.

cards.name: Razorfin Hunter
cards.text: {T}: Razorfin Hunter deals 1 damage to any target.
cards.flavor: No one knew if they'd been lurking under the sea all along, or if they'd been created by the Phyrexian overlay.
cards.original_text: {T}: Razorfin Hunter deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Soul Link
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.
Whenever enchanted creature is dealt damage, you gain that much life.
cards.flavor: They danced like puppets to a tune only Yawgmoth could hear.
cards.original_text: Whenever enchanted creature deals or is dealt damage, you gain that much life.

rulings.text: If the creature damages itself, both abilities trigger.

cards.name: Spiritmonger
cards.text:
Whenever Spiritmonger deals damage to a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on Spiritmonger.
{B}: Regenerate Spiritmonger.
{G}: Spiritmonger becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.
cards.original_text:
Whenever Spiritmonger deals damage to a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on Spiritmonger.
{B}: Regenerate Spiritmonger.
{G}: Spiritmonger becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

cards.name: Squee's Embrace
cards.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
When enchanted creature dies, return that card to its owner's hand.
cards.original_text:
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.
When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard, return that creature card to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Squee's Revenge
cards.text: Choose a number. Flip a coin that many times or until you lose a flip, whichever comes first. If you win all the flips, draw two cards for each flip.
cards.original_text: Choose a number. Flip a coin that many times or until you lose a flip, whichever comes first. If you win all the flips, draw two cards for each flip.

cards.name: Suffocating Blast
cards.text: Counter target spell and Suffocating Blast deals 3 damage to target creature.
cards.original_text: Counter target spell and Suffocating Blast deals 3 damage to target creature.

cards.name: Temporal Spring
cards.text: Put target permanent on top of its owner's library.
cards.flavor: One splash of the spring's water knocks you clear into last week.
cards.original_text: Put target permanent on top of its owner's library.

cards.name: Vindicate
cards.text: Destroy target permanent.
cards.flavor:
"Don't mourn for me. This is my destiny."
—Gerrard
cards.original_text: Destroy target permanent.

cards.name: Yavimaya's Embrace
cards.text:
Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample.
cards.original_text:
You control enchanted creature.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample.

cards.name: Fire
cards.text: Fire deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.
cards.original_text: Fire deals 2 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players.

cards.name: Ice
cards.text:
Tap target permanent.
Draw a card.
cards.original_text:
Tap target permanent.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Illusion
cards.text: Target spell or permanent becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.
cards.original_text: Target spell or permanent becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

cards.name: Reality
cards.text: Destroy target artifact.
cards.original_text: Destroy target artifact.

cards.name: Life
cards.text: All lands you control become 1/1 creatures until end of turn. They're still lands.
cards.original_text: Until end of turn, all lands you control are 1/1 creatures that are still lands.

rulings.text: A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn't matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

cards.name: Death
cards.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.
cards.original_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to play. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.

cards.name: Night
cards.text: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
cards.original_text: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Day
cards.text: Creatures target player controls get +1/+1 until end of turn.
cards.original_text: Creatures target player controls get +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Order
cards.text: Exile target attacking creature.
cards.original_text: Remove target attacking creature from the game.

cards.name: Chaos
cards.text: Creatures can't block this turn.
cards.original_text: Remove target attacking creature from the game.

cards.name: Brass Herald
cards.text:
As Brass Herald enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
When Brass Herald enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all creature cards of the chosen type revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
Creatures of the chosen type get +1/+1.
cards.original_text:
As Brass Herald comes into play, choose a creature type.
When Brass Herald comes into play, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all creature cards of the chosen type revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library.
Creatures of the chosen type get +1/+1.

rulings.text: You must choose a creature type that already exists in Magic.

cards.name: Dodecapod
cards.text: If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Dodecapod, put it onto the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it instead of putting it into your graveyard.
cards.original_text: If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Dodecapod from your hand, put it into play with two +1/+1 counters on it instead of putting it into your graveyard.

cards.name: Dragon Arch
cards.text: {2}, {T}: You may put a multicolored creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.
cards.flavor: In their hunger for the arch's power, mages often forget that it only makes dragons easier to summon. It doesn't make them easier to control.
cards.original_text: {2}, {T}: Put a multicolored creature card from your hand into play.

rulings.text: A multicolored card has more than one color in its mana cost.
Putting the card onto the battlefield is optional. When the ability resolves, you can choose not to.

cards.name: Emblazoned Golem
cards.text:
Kicker {X} (You may pay an additional {X} as you cast this spell.)
Spend only colored mana on X. No more than one mana of each color may be spent this way.
If Emblazoned Golem was kicked, it enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
cards.original_text:
Kicker {X} (You may pay an additional {X} as you play this spell.)
Spend only colored mana on X. No more than one mana of each color may be spent this way.
If you paid the kicker cost, Emblazoned Golem comes into play with X +1/+1 counters on it.

cards.name: Legacy Weapon
cards.text:
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Exile target permanent.
If Legacy Weapon would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Legacy Weapon and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.
cards.original_text:
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Remove target permanent from the game.
If Legacy Weapon would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Legacy Weapon and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.

cards.name: Mask of Intolerance
cards.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, if there are four or more basic land types among lands that player controls, Mask of Intolerance deals 3 damage to that player.
cards.original_text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, if there are four or more basic land types among lands that player controls, Mask of Intolerance deals 3 damage to him or her.

cards.name: Battlefield Forge
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}. Battlefield Forge deals 1 damage to you.
cards.original_text:
{T}: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool.
{T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool. Battlefield Forge deals 1 damage to you.

rulings.text: The damage dealt to you is part of the second mana ability. It doesn't use the stack and can't be responded to.
Like most lands, each land in this cycle is colorless. The damage dealt to you is dealt by a colorless source.
